title: Introduction to Watercolor
description: Learn the basics of watercolor painting, from color mixing to brush techniques. Suitable for beginners.

title: Advanced Watercolor Landscapes
description: Take your watercolor skills to the next level by creating stunning landscapes. Prior watercolor experience required.

title: Sketching Fundamentals
description: Master the art of sketching! This class covers basic shapes, proportions, and sketching from observation.

title: Advanced Shading Techniques
description: Learn how to add depth and realism to your drawings through shading, hatching, and cross-hatching.
